scripts.prod: ENV=prod meteor build 1build --architecture os.linux.x86_64 --server beteal.org && scp -i /c/Users/LukeM/.ssh/id_rsa_digital_ocean 1build/beteal.tar.gz lmadera@beteal.org:/tmp/beteal.tar.gz && cat linux-prod-deploy.sh | ssh -i /c/Users/LukeM/.ssh/id_rsa_digital_ocean lmadera@beteal.org
scripts.prodWin: SET ENV=prod && meteor build 1build --architecture os.linux.x86_64 --server beteal.org && scp -i \c\Users\LukeM\.ssh\id_rsa_digital_ocean 1build\beteal.tar.gz lmadera@beteal.org:/tmp/beteal.tar.gz && cat linux-prod-deploy.sh | ssh -i \c\Users\LukeM\.ssh\id_rsa_digital_ocean lmadera@beteal.org && SET ENV=
